metadata.description: Personal Claude Code plugins: LSP servers (uvx/npx) and custom agents

plugins.description: Python language server (via uvx - always latest)

plugins.name: vtsls-npx
plugins.description: TypeScript/JavaScript language server (via npx - always latest)

plugins.name: gopls-go
plugins.description: Go language server (requires gopls on PATH)

plugins.name: vscode-html-css-npx
plugins.description: HTML/CSS language servers (via npx - always latest)

plugins.name: rust-analyzer-rustup
plugins.description: Rust language server (requires rust-analyzer via rustup)

plugins.name: dev-guard
plugins.description: Development environment policy enforcement: tool selection guard, commit validation, pre-push review, URL fetch guard, trust management, oc/kubectl introspection

plugins.name: code-quality
plugins.description: Code quality agents and skills: architecture, security, QA, performance review plus file-audit, bug-investigation, unfuck, and swarm orchestration

plugins.name: dev-essentials
plugins.description: Essential development utilities: LSP navigation, uv-python enforcement, test execution, incremental planning, and session management

plugins.name: git-tools
plugins.description: Git workflow tools: history manipulation, defense-in-depth hooks, commit review, and CONTRIBUTING.md generation

plugins.name: cmux-integration
plugins.description: Bridges Claude Code hook events to CMUX terminal's CLI API: notifications, sidebar status, and activity logging
